plot: A father (Tom Fahn) does everything he can to get his 9 year old daughter to come out of the bathroom on a Saturday afternoon so he can get back to watch the end of the Dodger game on TV. ...
plot_en: A father (Tom Fahn) does everything he can to get his 9 year old daughter to come out of the bathroom on a Saturday afternoon so he can get back to watch the end of the Dodger game on TV. ...
plot_es: A father (Tom Fahn) does everything he can to get his 9 year old daughter to come out of the bathroom on a Saturday afternoon so he can get back to watch the end of the Dodger game on TV. ...
title: Fun Dad
